   Rick Scott
   stated on January 19, 2019 in a tweet:
   "I’ve always supported protections for our DREAMers."

Scott opposed Dreamer protections in early years

   Early in his tenure, Scott took stances that were counter to helping
   undocumented immigrants, including Dreamers.

We asked Scott’s press office if he had evidence that he "always"
   supported protections for Dreamers.

Our ruling

   Scott said, "I’ve always supported protections for our DREAMers."
